entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:27 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 06:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 8.4°C
Wind: SE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Freezing rain beginning before morning. 60 percent chance of freezing rain inland late this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain except rain along parts of the coast. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
